name: Baby-Led Weaning Oatmeal Bites
author: Lauren Magenta
summary: These oatmeal bites are perfect for a baby who is working on baby-led weaning or a toddler who is self-feeding. These bites are packed with protein, fats, and nutrients! Once your child has mastered different fruits or nut butters, you can mix them into the cooked oatmeal.
directions: Pour milk and oats into a pot over medium heat and mix to combine
Stir in chia seeds, ground flax seeds, and hemp seeds
Bring oatmeal to a soft boil; reduce heat and cook until slightly thickened, about 5 minutes
Pour oatmeal into a glass dish with an airtight lid
Refrigerate until completely cooled before cutting into bite-sized pieces, about 1 hour
